Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the widest of all the hallways in Prince Rutger's Tower Castle.
Room.LongDescription: It goes completely around the castle's ground level, and eventually will come back to this place. There are a great many doors along the way, and several side corridors running towards the center of the castle. Most of the castle's activities are held in the courtyard.
